attributes.action: Images to be put on cosmetics that have been tested on animals
attributes.additional_details:
In a bid to STOP animal testing, images of animals being tested on should be put on the packaging of ALL cosmetics/household products so people know exactly what has happened to these poor animals before buying.

Warnings are put on cigarettes. Why not cosmetics/household products?

The government are willing to put warnings/images on cigarette packages because it affects humans health dramatically. Don't animals deserve the same? The torture and abuse they go through for testing is appalling and should be highlighted on packaging.

It has been proven that animal testing is unnecessary as there is a way of using donor skin cells to produce "real" skin for testing. So why is this still going ahead? Animals have as much right to be on this planet as humans do. They deserve a free and happy life.

Animal testing and the use of animals for research needs to stop NOW!
